feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
